title: Worry Postponement
summary: Contain rumination by scheduling a short worry window later.
safety_notes: If the worry involves imminent danger, address safety first.

offCopy.intro: Your mind is busy. We'll capture worries and set a time to think them through later.

steps.label: Capture
steps.body: Write the worry in one sentence.

steps.label: Schedule
steps.body: Pick a 10-minute window within 24h to revisit it.

steps.label: Redirect
steps.body: Return to your current task; if worry pops up, say: 'I'll handle you at the scheduled time.'

offCopy.completion: You trained your brain to focus by containing worry.

verseKJV.text: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication...

light.prompt: Cast the worry on God briefly, then return to the task.

verseKJV.text: Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

disciple.identity: You are cared for; you can postpone without fear.

verseKJV.text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow...

kingdom.commission: Seek first His kingdom as you work.
